description: Apple is finding itself squarely in the crosshairs of President Donald Trump’s new tariffs. The tariffs cover many Apple manufacturing centers, undercutting efforts to shift away from China. India, where Apple is increasingly building iPhones and AirPods for instance, is getting a 26 percent reciprocal tariff.
title: Apple Production Hubs Hit by Tariffs, Sending Shares Plummeting

description: Babah (2024) is a Malaysian drama film directed by Mohd Shah Faizul. The film revolves around Isyak, a devoted father caring for his daughter Maya, who battles Guillain-Barré Syndrome. The movie was released in Malaysian cinemas on December 5, 2024 and has earned RM7.09 million. Starring Qi Razali, Sweet Qismina, and Cristina Suzanne, the film has received positive reviews for its emotional depth and realistic storytelling
title: Babah (2024) Malaysian Drama is Now Available for Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: Following a successful theatrical run, Choo Mantar is now available on Prime Video. Directed by Navaneeth, this horror-comedy follows paranormal expert Gowtham (Sharan) and his team as they embark on a spooky treasure hunt inside the haunted Morgan House. The film blends humour and supernatural thrills, making it a must-watch for fans of the genre. With an IMDb rating of 9.2/10, Choo Mantar has received praise for its engaging storyline and performances. Watch it now on Prime Video!
title: Choo Mantar Now Streaming on Prime Video After a Successful Theatrical Run

description: Nothing sub-brand CMF appears to be preparing to launch a new smartphone in India soon. The UK-based electronics brand, posted a teaser on social media on Thursday, offering hints at the rear camera module of the upcoming handset. While the brand remains tight-lipped about its moniker, it is speculated that the CMF Phone 2 could break cover soon as a possible successor to last year's CMF Phone 1.
title: CMF by Nothing Teases New Smartphone Launch; Could Be CMF Phone 2

description: The first-ever orbital rocket launch from European soil ended in failure as Isar Aerospace’s Spectrum crashed after liftoff from Norway’s Andøya Spaceport. The rocket experienced an anomaly 18 seconds into the flight, leading to a loss of control before it plummeted back to Earth and exploded. The test was conducted to gather data, and no payloads were onboard. An investigation is ongoing to determine the cause of the failure, and it remains unclear how this will impact Spectrum’s future missions.
title: First Orbital Rocket Launch from Europe Fails as Spectrum Explodes Midair

description: Garmin Instinct 3 series rugged smartwatches have been launched in India. The lineup includes the Instinct 3 model and an Instinct E variant. The standard Instinct 3 is available in two variants, one with an AMOLED display and another with an MIP panel with solar charging support. The E variant also has an MIP display. The watches come with MIL-STD-810 durability certifications and 10ATM water-resistant ratings.
title: Garmin Instinct 3 Series Rugged Smartwatches With GPS Support Launched in India: Price, Features

description: The James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has captured groundbreaking images of exoplanets in the HR 8799 and 51 Eridani systems. By modifying its coronagraphs, astronomers allowed more starlight to pass through, revealing clearer planetary details. The study, published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters, highlights the first successful detection of HR 8799 at 4.6 microns—a wavelength blocked by Earth’s atmosphere. Researchers also identified carbon dioxide, supporting the theory that these planets formed through core accretion. Additional JWST observations are planned to study more planetary systems and their formation processes.
title: JWST Captures Unseen Details of Exoplanets in HR 8799 and 51 Eridani Systems

description: The adrenaline-fueled crime thriller Carjackers is now streaming on Prime Video. Directed by Kamel Guemra, the film follows four young hotel employees—Nora, Zoé, Steve, and Prestance—who pull off sophisticated heists during their lunch breaks. Their secret operation runs smoothly until a hotel manager hires a ruthless hitman, Elias, to track them down. Starring Zoé Marchal, Franck Gastambide, Bosh, and Maréva Ranarivelo, Carjackers delivers intense action and gripping suspense. Watch it now on Prime Video!
title: Kamel Guemra’s Carjackers Now Streaming on Prime Video

description: A recent laboratory experiment conducted by researchers at JILA and NIST has disproved a long-held theory about how benzene forms in interstellar space. The study tested ion-molecule collisions at near-zero temperatures and extremely low pressure but failed to produce benzene. This challenges earlier theories linking benzene to the formation of carbon compounds essential for life. Scientists are now expected to investigate alternative chemical pathways for benzene formation in space.
title: Laboratory Test Shows Ion-Molecule Collision Theory Fails to Produce Benzene in Space Conditions

description: A volcanic fissure has emerged near Grindavík, Iceland, following a series of strong earthquakes. The fissure, nearly 1,200 metres long, has breached the town’s defences, and authorities have evacuated residents, including those at the nearby Blue Lagoon spa. Roads in and out of the area have been shut, and a second fissure has appeared inside Grindavík’s protective barriers. Volcanic gas from the eruption is expected to affect air quality in Reykjavík. The situation remains critical, with the hazard level raised to the highest risk category, and scientists are closely monitoring the event.
title: Lava Breaches Grindavík's Defences as Volcanic Fissure Erupts in Iceland

description: Maareesan is a Tamil-language film directed by Sudheesh Sankar and produced by R.B. Choudary under Super Good Films. Featuring Fahadh Faasil and Vadivelu, the movie follows two friends on an adventure that takes an unexpected turn. The film is set to release in cinemas in July 2025. After its theatrical run, it will stream on Netflix. Yuvan Shankar Raja has composed the music, and Sreejith Sarang handled the editing
title: Maareesan OTT Release: When and Where to Watch it Online After its Theatrical Release

description: A strong X1.1-class solar flare erupted from sunspot AR4046 on March 28, 2025. The flare caused major radio blackouts in North and South America, affecting high-frequency communications. A coronal mass ejection (CME) followed the flare but is not expected to hit Earth. More solar activity is anticipated from sunspot AR4046 and AR4048, with a 15% chance of another X-class flare in the coming days.
title: Massive X1.1-class Solar Flare Causes Radio Blackouts Across America

description: Jetking CFO Siddharth Bharwani said the company would raise Rs. 6.6 crore by selling 4,28,622 equity shares in compliance with SEBI regulations. Some portion of the collection will also be utilised to initiate Bitcoin-related educational, training, and skill development programmes in India
title: Mumbai-Based IT Training Firm Jetking to Raise Over Rs. 6 Crore to Fund Bitcoin Acquisition

description: NASA’s SPHEREx telescope has captured its first images from space, marking a critical milestone before its full-sky infrared survey begins. The observatory, launched on March 11, recorded thousands of light sources, including distant galaxies and stars. Unlike other space telescopes, SPHEREx is designed for large-scale cosmic mapping, scanning the sky four times in two years. The data will help researchers explore the origins of water in the Milky Way and the universe’s earliest moments. Engineers have confirmed the telescope is functioning as expected, with routine operations set to begin in late April.
title: NASA’s SPHEREx Mission Sends First Space Images Before Full Sky Survey

description: Nintendo is estimated to sell 14.7 million of the new Switch 2 video-game consoles this year, as per Omida's research. The new console debuts on June 5 at a suggested retail price of $450 (roughly Rs. 38,390).
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Projected to Sell Over 14 Million Units in 2025, Mario Kart World to Drive Sales

description: OnePlus 13T is set to launch in China later this month. As we wait for the official release, Louis Lee, President of OnePlus China, has revealed the battery capacity and weight of the compact flagship. It is confirmed to come with a bigger battery than the OnePlus 13. Additionally, OnePlus 13T made its debut on the AnTuTu performance benchmarking platform, giving us an idea about the underlying performance of its next flagship smartphone.
title: OnePlus 13T Battery Capacity Teased Ahead of Launch; Handset Scores Over 3 Million Points on AnTuTu

description: Redline (2007) is an adrenaline-fueled action thriller about underground racing and high-stakes gambling, featuring exotic supercars from a private collection. Starring Nathan Phillips, Nadia Bjorlin, and Eddie Griffin, the film follows Natasha Martin, a gifted mechanic and aspiring musician drawn into a deadly racing circuit. Despite its flashy car chases and big-budget visuals, Redline was a box office disappointment, grossing only $6.8 million against a $26 million budget. However, fans of fast cars and action-packed spectacles can now relive the high-speed drama on Lionsgate Play.
title: Redline Now Available on Lionsgate Play: What You Need to Know About Action-Packed Racing Thriller

description: SpaceX's Fram2 mission has launched from Kennedy Space Center, marking a major milestone in private spaceflight. Led by billionaire Chun Wang, the crew of four will spend up to five days in orbit conducting 22 scientific experiments. Their research includes studying mushroom growth in microgravity and advanced X-ray imaging of the human body. The mission, operated by the Crew Dragon capsule, aims to contribute to future space exploration, including Mars missions. SpaceX confirms the crew will return via a controlled splashdown at sea.
title: SpaceX Fram2 Mission Lifts Off, First Private Flight Over Earth's Poles

description: SpaceX’s Fram2 mission, launched on March 31, has made history as the first astronaut mission to orbit over both poles. The Crew Dragon spacecraft Resilience is carrying four first-time astronauts—Chun Wang, Jannicke Mikkelsen, Rabea Rogge, and Eric Phillips—on a research-driven journey. The crew has captured stunning images of Earth’s Arctic and Antarctic regions, never before seen from a human spaceflight. In addition to photography, the team is conducting experiments, including the first X-ray scans in space and growing mushrooms in microgravity. Fram2 will conclude with a splashdown in the Pacific Ocean.
title: SpaceX’s Fram2 Crew Captures First-Ever Views of Earth’s Polar Regions

description: This week, the US House Financial Services Committee passed the proposed stablecoin bill – pushing it to the House floor for a full vote. The lawmakers in the US are aiming to finalise stablecoin regulations by August 2025.
title: US Stablecoin Regulation Bill Nears Final Approval from House Committee: Key Details

description: Samsung might be developing a foldable phone with four panels connected by three hinges, forming a single elongated display when unfolded. The panels fold into a thick bar, according to a patent application that has been published online. Samsung has yet to launch a tri-fold smartphone to rival the Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Edition
title: Samsung Patent Application Describes Phone With Four Foldable Panels, Three Hinges

description: Nintendo fully unveiled its next-generation hybrid console in a Nintendo Direct presentation Wednesday, finally giving the world a closer look at the Switch 2. In an hour-long showcase, the company shared details about the console itself, its new and returning features, some of its hardware specifications, and — most importantly — games coming to the Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, The Duskbloods: Every Game Coming to Nintendo Switch 2

description: Spotify introduced a suite of new ad solutions on Wednesday at the Spotify Advance event in New York. The biggest highlight is the new programmatic advertising platform dubbed Spotify Ad Exchange (SAX), which will offer advertisers access to the music streaming platform’s engaged and logged-in users. Alongside, the company is also introducing a new ad manager and its first AI tools to generate scripts and voiceovers.
title: Spotify Unveils New Ad Manager Platform, AI-Powered Tools for Advertisers

description: Anthropic introduced a new subscription tier dubbed Claude for Education on Wednesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) firm said that the plan will include a specialised version of its chatbot aimed at higher education institutions. With this tier, universities can also opt for full campus access that will let students, faculty, and administrative staff use the AI chatbot for their role-specific functions.
title: Anthropic Introduces Claude for Education Plan for Students and Academic Staff

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has announced a new recharge plan for its prepaid mobile users in India. Priced at Rs. 251, it is introduced as a Special Tariff Voucher (STVs) which means it does not come with an active service validity. As per the state-run telecommunications operator, the new prepaid recharge voucher targets viewers of the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 in the country and offers data benefits.
title: BSNL Launches IPL 251 Prepaid Recharge Plan With 251GB Data, 60-Day Validity

description: In the age of carbon silicon batteries (versus the older graphite-based technology), there indeed appears to be no limits to capacity. Honor now seems to be taking things to the next level as it’s rumoured to be readying a new series of mid-range smartphones with large capacity batteries. However, we don’t expect these to be as thick as the older generation of ‘big battery’ smartphones.
title: Honor May Launch a Mid-Range Smartphone With an 8,000mAh Battery

description: Netflix's TV app now supports multilingual viewing, letting users select from all available languages for audio and subtitles while watching a TV show or movies. This update enables language selection across the entire catalogue, bringing the TV viewing experience on par with mobile devices and PCs.
title: Netflix TV App Updated With Multilingual Audio Support for All Movies, TV Shows

description: Oppo Find X8 Ultra, Find X8s and Find X8s+ are scheduled to go official in China next week. As we wait for the formal reveal, Oppo has unveiled its Lumo imaging system for smartphone photography. The new technology, which supports multiple focal lengths, is set to debut with the upcoming Find X8 series smartphones. The flagship Oppo Find X8 Ultra is confirmed to feature a Sony Lytia LYT-900 sensor.
title: Oppo Announces Lumo Image Engine; to Debut With Oppo Find X8 Ultra, Find X8s Series

description: Sony Bravia Projector 7 was launched on Wednesday. It is the latest addition to the company’s lineup of high-end Silicon X-tal Reflective Display (SXRD) laser projectors. The projector is powered by the Bravia XR Processor which is claimed to enable XR Dynamic Tone Mapping, XR Deep Black, and other features for visual enhancing the images.
title: Sony Bravia Projector 7 With 4K 120 FPS Support and XR Processor Launched

description: Vivo T4 5G will launch in India soon. The handset is teased to come with a Snapdragon chipset, a bigger battery, and faster charging speed than the preceding Vivo T3 5G model. A recent report has hinted at the key expected features of the upcoming smartphone including display, chipset, battery, charging and camera details. The design and colour options of the phone have been leaked as well.
title: Vivo T4 5G India Launch Timeline, Design, Colour Options, Key Specifications Leaked

description: Amazon.com became the latest big name to jump into the fray, submitting a bid to the White House to buy out a business once valued at $60 billion (roughly Rs. 5,13,272 crore).
title: Amazon Submits Bid to Buy TikTok, Adding 11th Hour Intrigue to Acquisition Drama

description: Google NotebookLM is getting a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will make it easier for users to add sources for a particular topic. Announced on Wednesday, the new feature is dubbed Discover Sources, and it can scour the Internet to find relevant sources for a given topic. The Mountain View-based tech giant said that this feature uses Gemini to find information on the web.
title: Google NotebookLM Is Getting a New Discover Sources Feature That Can Search the Web

description: Apple released the iOS 18.4 update for iPhone on Monday with a plethora of new features. In addition to Priority Notifications, new toggles in the Control Centre, and the availability of Visual Intelligence on the iPhone 15 Pro models, the update introduces two new features for the App Store which can potentially aid users in making a decision of whether to download an app and managing downloads when facing network congestion or poor connectivity.
title: iOS 18.4 Update Brings AI Review Summaries in App Store, Lets Users Pause Downloads

description: Meta and its representatives met with President Trump and his senior advisers ahead of an April 14 Federal Trade Commission trial that could force the company to unwind its acquisitions of messaging platform WhatsApp and image-sharing app Instagram.
title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg Lobbies Donald Trump to Avoid Antitrust Trial: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE is anticipated to go official in the second half of this year as an affordable clamshell foldable smartphone. Samsung has not yet confirmed the existence of the FE version of its flip phone, but ahead of it, its specifications have leaked online. The Galaxy Z Flip FE is tipped to come with Samsung's in-house Exynos processor and use camera sensors from the Galaxy Z Flip 5. It is expected to be unveiled alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE Specificatons Leaked; Tipped to Use Same Chipset as Galaxy S24 FE

description: Samsung announced the rollout of new artificial intelligence (AI) features to its latest Galaxy A series smartphones on Wednesday. The South Korean tech giant is releasing several new AI features under the “Awesome Intelligence” suite. It is a toned-down subset of the Galaxy AI suite designed for the company’s midrange handsets.
title: Samsung Rolling Out AI-Powered ‘Awesome Intelligence’ Features to Galaxy A Series Smartphones

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra was unveiled in India on March 11 alongside the base Xiaomi 15. Both phones are now available for purchase in the country. They are powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and ship with Android 15 with HyperOS 2.0 skin on top. Xiaomi offers IP68-rated dust and water resistance and in-display fingerprint sensors for biometric authentication on both models. For optics, the phones come with Leica-backed rear camera units alongside 32-megapixel selfie shooters.
title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra, Xiaomi 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Now Available in India: Price, Offers

description: Adobe is rolling out several new features for Premiere Pro and After Effects. Announced on Wednesday, these features will be showcased at the National Association of Broadcasters (NAB) Show 2025 in Las Vegas. The company says it took feedback from professional editors and motion designers and is now introducing artificial intelligence (AI) workflow features and improvements to its platforms.
title: Adobe Adds New Features to Premiere Pro and After Effects, Makes Generative Extend Generally Available

description: The overall crypto market cap slipped by 1.68 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether registered losses on Wednesday, April 3. Other altcoins that reflected price drops include Solana, Dogecoin, Cardano, Tron, and Chainlink. Meanwhile, some altcoins such as Litecoin and Cosmos saw gains.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Faces Loss Alongside Most Altcoins Following Trump’s Tariff Decision

description: Cybercriminals are exploiting the 'Lucid' phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) platform to send phishing messages via iMessage and RCS chats, according to researchers. Using device farms of iPhone and Android smartphones, these phishing messages evade SMS spam filters due to end-to-end encryption. Licences for Lucid are reportedly being sold on Telegram, enabling large-scale phishing campaigns by anyone who can pay for a weekly licence.
title: Cybercriminals Offer Access to 'Lucid' Phishing Platform to Target iPhone, Android Phones in 88 Countries

description: Oppo Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G were launched in India in January this year, two months after their debut in China. Now, leaks about their potential successors have started appearing on the Web. The Oppo Reno 14 series is expected to include the standard Oppo Reno 14 and Reno 14 Pro. They are said to have a lightweight build and periscope telephoto camera. Oppo is said to pack flat displays in the upcoming phones.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Series Tipped to Feature Flat Display, Periscope Telephoto Camera and More

description: This week’s OTT releases bring a mix of comedy, thriller, and drama. Jesse Eisenberg's ‘A Real Pain’ explores family dynamics, while ‘Test’ presents a gripping cricket drama. ‘Chamak – The Conclusion’ continues its crime thriller, and ‘Adrishyam’ returns for another thrilling season. Legal thriller ‘Juror #2’ and medical drama ‘Pulse’ add variety to your watchlist. Catch these exciting titles on Netflix, Sony LIV, and Jio Hotstar
title: OTT Releases This Week (Mar 31 - Apr 6): A Real Pain, Test, Kraven the Hunter, and More

description: Reliance Jio emerged as the fastest mobile network provider in India across all technologies combined in the second half (H2) of 2024, according to a market analysis. The telecommunications service provider also led the market in terms of highest 5G availability across cities, with 73.7 percent of its users being able to access Jio’s 5G network a majority of the time.
title: Reliance Jio Led Indian Market In Network Speed and Mobile Coverage; Airtel Offered Best 5G Gaming in H2 2024

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE series was launched in select global markets, including India, on Wednesday. The lineup includes the Galaxy Tab S10 FE and Tab S10 FE+, which are available in Wi-Fi and 5G options. The tablets are powered by in-house Exynos 1580​ chipsets paired with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. They ship with Android 15-based One UI 7, offer AI features, and have IP68-rated dust and water-resistant builds.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE, Tab S10 FE+ With Exynos 1580​ SoCs Launched in India: Price, Features
Intel Core Ultra 200S Series: Revolutionizing Gaming and Creative Performance

description: Samsung was expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge sometime this month. Now, a new report from Korea suggests that the tech giant has postponed the launch by a month or two. The slim handset was teased at the Galaxy Unpacked event earlier this year and will debut as the fourth model in the Galaxy S25  series. It could measure 5.8mm in thickness and is likely to boast a 6.7-inch display and a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Reportedly Delayed by a Month or Two

description: Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 has been launched as the successor to last year's Snapdragon 8s Gen 3, and the new chip is claimed to deliver enhanced CPU, GPU, and AI performance. Built on TSMC's 4nm process, this chip is expected to arrive on gaming smartphones, with support for hardware-accelerated ray tracing and on-device generative AI. It offers Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 6.0 connectivity, along with Quick Charge 5 support.
title: Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 With Up to 31 Percent Boost in CPU Performance, Adreno 825 GPU Launched

description: Vivo will unveil the X200s and X200 Ultra handsets later this month. The company has previously confirmed that it will introduce the Vivo Pad 5 Pro and Pad SE tablets alongside the smartphones. A Vivo Watch 5 model will also tag along. The design and colour options of the accompanying devices have been teased. Some key features of the tablets and smartwatch have now surfaced online.
title: Vivo Pad 5 Pro, Pad SE, Watch 5 Key Features Surface Online Ahead of Anticipated Launch

description: Apple on Wednesday released the iOS 18.5 Developer Beta 1 update for the iPhone to developers and beta testers. Apple's latest update is not a substantial introduction but still includes a handful of minor changes to the Mail app and AppleCare information. Further, it also introduces system stability improvements and resolves bugs and issues related to the Apple Vision Pro app, StoreKit, Writing Tools, and more on the iPhone.
title: iOS 18.5 Developer Beta 1 Update for iPhone Rolls Out With Minor Changes, Bug Fixes

description: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, originally released in 2010, has received a modern iOS port courtesy of Feral Interactive. We've spent a few days with Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light and think it is a near-perfect port for iOS, one which promises to become a great avenue to pass the time especially during daily commute.
title: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light (iOS) Review: A Near-Perfect Port for the Small Screen

description: Sony Xperia 1 VII is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Xperia 1 VI. Ahead of its anticipated introduction, 5K CAD renders of the purported smartphone are said to have surfaced, giving us the first glimpse at its design. According to a report, the phone may arrive with minimal design changes compared to its predecessor, retaining the same 6.5-inch screen size, a vertical camera module, and similar dimensions as before.
title: Sony Xperia 1 VII CAD Renders Reportedly Leak; Tipped to See Minimal Design Changes
